creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Large central dragon-like face with third eye; flames coming out of mouth and on forehead; bordered on 3 sides by band of alternating faces, skulls and links; brocaded fabric border; red backing and 3 red loops on top; multi-colored fringe on bottom
markings: [3500], in blue ink, lower right corner on back
title: Apron
